The image was originally tweeted by Paki: based journalist Bashir Chaudhary, linking it to police violence during the farmers' tractor parade on January 26.
Alt News performed a reverse image searc: which was clicked by photographer Shekhar Yadav in 2013. Other images related to the same incident were also found on Getty Images.
Shekhar Yadav: the photographer of the image, debunked the claim on Twitter by stating that the photo was from the 1984 Sikh riots anniversary protests and not related to the clashes between farmers and Delhi police.
